Name: Torecower
About the game: Torecower is an arcade wave-based minimalist game where you build automatic turrets to shoot enemies. Each turret has an unique attack behaviour. After finishing a wave, you can get an upgrade on the skill tree. Choose wisely to make your turrets stronger. Turrets üè∞ Each turret have unique behaviors based on it's color: Shooters shoots faster and it's bullets may pierce enemies; Arcanes are focused on casting magic-bolts and thunders. Upgrades ‚ú® After finishing a wave, you may pick an upgrade to buff your turrets, choose wisely! Going for the Shooter path blocks you from following the Arcane one. Features üòé 12+ turrets, each with unique attacks 4+ classes, each with unique effects and behaviours 20 waves, making the game harder on the late-game 4+ enemies, each with unique attributes
